title: EUOVMY Women's Short Sleeve Loose Plain Maxi Dresses Casual Vacation Long Dresses with Pockets
description: Size Guide:Small=(US 4-6), Medium=(US 8-10), Large=(US 12-14), X-Large=(US 16-18), XX-Large=(US 20-22). The size chart includes the model's size as a reference. Please review the size chart information carefully

Fabric:This empire waist long dress is made of 95% Rayon and 5% Spandex, making it soft, skin-friendly, lightweight, breathable, and stretchy. Wear this Women's Short Sleeve Maxi Dress for a timeless, classic look!Wash Care: Machine wash or hand wash with cold water and mild detergent. Gently wash rayon and lay flat to dry

Design:This women summer maxi dress features a classic crew neck, an A-line design, a fitted elastic waist, a flowy skirt, short sleeves, side pockets, and a floor-length cut. Non-transparent with an empire waist, it flatters the figure and is available in plus sizes, solid colors, prints, florals, and stripes, making it a trendy 2025 outfit. This casual long maternity dress is also great for expectant mothers

Occasion:This classic women casual loose short sleeve long dress, suitable for all seasons, is perfect for various occasions, whether it's for casual wear, work, the beach, dates, graduations, birthday parties, events, honeymoons, holidays, family gatherings, photoshoots, outdoor activities, the office, clubs, cocktail parties, evening dinners, shopping, weddings, daily life, or maternity wear. This spring casual vintage long dress is a must-have fashion item

Match:This women 2024 long summer dress is both classic and trendy. It can be paired with flat shoes, sandals, or sneakers for a relaxed and comfortable everyday look. Simple accessories like bracelets, necklaces, and sunglasses can add a touch of style. If the weather is cooler, you can pair it with a delicate shawl, a lightweight cardigan, a denim jacket, or a leather jacket. This woman maxi dress is both comfortable and fashionable
